browser_session_id.title: Browser Session Id
browser_session_id.description: Unique identifier for the browser session

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: ID of the organization that owns this session

runnable_type.title: Runnable Type
runnable_type.description: Type of runnable associated with this session (workflow, task etc)

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Timestamp when the session was created

modified_at.title: Modified At
modified_at.description: Timestamp when the session was last modified

deleted_at.title: Deleted At
deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the session was deleted, if applicable

BrowserSessionResponse.title: BrowserSessionResponse
BrowserSessionResponse.description: Response model for browser session information.

FileInfo.title: FileInfo
FileInfo.description: Information about a downloaded file, including URL and checksum.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The goal or task description for Skyvern to accomplish

url.title: Url
url.description: The starting URL for the task. If not provided, Skyvern will attempt to determine an appropriate URL

engine.description: The Skyvern engine version to use for this task

proxy_location.description: Geographic Proxy location to route the browser traffic through

data_extraction_schema.title: Data Extraction Schema
data_extraction_schema.description: Schema defining what data should be extracted from the webpage

error_code_mapping.title: Error Code Mapping
error_code_mapping.description: Custom mapping of error codes to error messages if Skyvern encounters an error

max_steps.title: Max Steps
max_steps.description: Maximum number of steps the task can take before timing out

webhook_url.title: Webhook Url
webhook_url.description: URL to send task status updates to after a run is finished

totp_identifier.title: Totp Identifier
totp_identifier.description: Identifier for TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password) authentication if codes are being pushed to Skyvern

totp_url.title: Totp Url
totp_url.description: URL for TOTP authentication setup if Skyvern should be polling endpoint for 2FA codes

browser_session_id.title: Browser Session Id
browser_session_id.description: ID of an existing browser session to reuse, having it continue from the current screen state

publish_workflow.title: Publish Workflow
publish_workflow.description: Whether to publish this task as a reusable workflow.

output.title: Output
output.description: Output data from the run, if any. Format depends on the schema in the input

downloaded_files.title: Downloaded Files
downloaded_files.description: List of files downloaded during the run

recording_url.title: Recording Url
recording_url.description: URL to the recording of the run

failure_reason.title: Failure Reason
failure_reason.description: Reason for failure if the run failed

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Timestamp when this run was created

modified_at.title: Modified At
modified_at.description: Timestamp when this run was last modified

run_type.title: Run Type
run_type.description: Type of task run - either task_v1 or task_v2

run_request.description: The original request parameters used to start this task run

workflow_id.title: Workflow Id
workflow_id.description: ID of the workflow to run

title.title: Title
title.description: Optional title for this workflow run

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass to the workflow

proxy_location.description: Location of proxy to use for this workflow run

webhook_url.title: Webhook Url
webhook_url.description: URL to send workflow status updates to after a run is finished

totp_url.title: Totp Url
totp_url.description: URL for TOTP authentication setup if Skyvern should be polling endpoint for 2FA codes

totp_identifier.title: Totp Identifier
totp_identifier.description: Identifier for TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password) authentication if codes are being pushed to Skyvern

browser_session_id.title: Browser Session Id
browser_session_id.description: ID of an existing browser session to reuse, having it continue from the current screen state

output.title: Output
output.description: Output data from the run, if any. Format depends on the schema in the input

downloaded_files.title: Downloaded Files
downloaded_files.description: List of files downloaded during the run

recording_url.title: Recording Url
recording_url.description: URL to the recording of the run

failure_reason.title: Failure Reason
failure_reason.description: Reason for failure if the run failed

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Timestamp when this run was created

modified_at.title: Modified At
modified_at.description: Timestamp when this run was last modified

run_type.title: Run Type
run_type.description: Type of run - always workflow_run for workflow runs

run_request.description: The original request parameters used to start this workflow run
